comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Ancient Egyptian Art, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 37184345@N04
comment._content:
the under-ground galleries of the step pyramid at sakara around 2700 b. c ..the walls are covered with blue & green ceiramc tiles 
imitate  the ancient reeded mates used by the ancient egyptians
